column2: Incorrect color of stars on completed levels in the "Summer" company

When viewing the level selection screen in the Summer campaign window, all completed levels, instead of correctly filling in the stars received for completing the level, display three empty (black) stars.

1. Open Main Menu
2. Select "Campaign"
3. Select "Summer"
4. Select level
5. Complete level
6. Return to level selection window
The color (quantity) of stars received per level is displayed correctly
Incorrect color of stars on completed levels in the "Summer" campaign
